trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 이 자동화 피어와 연결 된 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 패턴을 지정 하는 값 열거형입니다.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is the , , , , , or value, this method returns an object that supports the control pattern; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 경우 컨트롤 패턴을 지원 하는 개체 patternInterface 는 , , , , , 또는 값인 경우이 메서드 반환을 지 원하는 컨트롤 패턴; 개체 그렇지 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref> is not enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
